item.title: [PI] Dialogue
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

I have started working on PI and I wanted to edit some dialogue but I see this
and I don’t know where the c.dialogueAction = 24; is going
I’ve tried client.java actionhandler.java player.java player everything .java!

case 24: sendNpcChat4("Hello adventurer...", "My name is Sir Tristram,", "I am here looking for artifact's ", "do you have any that I can take off of your hands?", c.talkingNpc, "Sir Tristram"); c.nextChat = 25; break; case 25: sendOption2("Sell him your PvP Items.", "No thanks."); c.dialogueAction = 24; break;

Somehow he is taking items 14876-14892 and I have no idea how
If you can tell me where to find it that will be helpful

The only import in the dialoguehandler is client.java so I checked that and it wasn’t there
I am thinking its an int somewhere out there

Read full topic
